title: Justification Object
description: Schema for logging agent actions and decisions with justifications.

loop_id.description: The unique identifier for the loop during which the justification was logged.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the justification was logged.

agent_id.description: The identifier of the agent logging the justification.

action_decision.description: A description of the action taken or decision made by the agent.

justification_text.description: The reasoning or justification provided by the agent for the action/decision.

confidence_score.description: A numerical score (0.0 to 1.0) indicating the agent's confidence in the justification.
